1.content:
Backstory: Sarah is a freshman in college and was a famous video game streamer that had thousands of followers and went by the name "Athletic Zelda Girl". Her new semi-famous status created a group of creeps that targeted her to be kidnapped......

Late on a Friday night: Sarah was in her college dorm room when she heard a knock at the door. She initially ignored it but after several more frantic knocks, she would answer it wondering "Who could it possibly be this late at night?". She cracked her door open just enough to stick her head out "Can I help you...officers?" she asked hesitantly when she noticed it was two police officers. The officer that was closer to the door froze in silence when Sarah opened the door completely revealing her body. "Helloooo?!?!?" Sarah exclaimed to get the cop out of a trance like state while staring at her skimpy outfit (a white tank crop top that exposed her toned stomach, a pair of short and tight jean shorts that showed off her athletic butt and a pair of ankle socks and athletic shoes).

The officer snapped out of the daze and asked "We are here to investigate a noise complaint about this room" "Umm...Are you sure? I am the only one here" Sarah stated. "This is dorm #312 isn't it?" he said back to her. "Uhh....yea" she responded in a confused manner. "Good, we just need to come in and make sure nothing fishy is going on here." he stated while trying to walk inside her room. Sarah stood in the doorway to block the officer from coming in and said "I already told you that nothing wrong is taking place, I am the only one here". "There is no need to raise your voice at me" he stated. "I would like you two to leave, you must have the wrong room" Sarah said with an attitude while folding her arms. "Miss, I am going to need you to cooperate or I will arrest you" he responded back quickly. "Arrest me? For what! I know my rights...are you guys even real cops?" she said in a defensive manner. "I assure you we are, but I need you to step aside and let us in so I can close out this complaint" he said while trying once again to get into her dorm.

Sarah was unconvinced these men were actual cops. She somehow could decipher the terminology he was using to figure out something wasn't right. To make sure he was a real cop she asked...."What is your badge number without looking at it and I will let you in". "Umm....3....2.....5...." the man stuttered and guessed his way incorrectly. "I knew it...good bye" she stated sternly while shutting the door. Before the door could shut all the way, the officer stopped it with his foot and pushed the door open and replied "not so fast my dear". Sarah had enough of this man and was pushing back on the door in an attempt to shut and lock him out. He was too strong for her and opened the door with all of his strength, forcing Sarah to fall backwards onto the ground when the door swung open.

The men nonchalantly walked inside her room while shutting and locking the door. "Well we tried to be nice, looks like you want to do this the hard way....Athletic Zelda Girl" he stated while pulling out a white cloth and dabbing some sort of liquid on it. "You guys stalked me to where I live?!" Sarah asked in a scared tone while quickly getting up off of the floor. She was backpedaling towards her bed, fear visible on her lovely face. "Oh, let's just say we watch all of your videos on repeat" he replied back. She was stammering some sort of protest, but clearly the girl had never been presented with real danger before, and was freezing up. "She looks like a tough one, don't she?" his friend said. "Back off!" Sarah shouted, proving the man correct. She was against her bed now, and both men kept advancing "Get away you creeps!" she shrieked while trying to fight the two of them from grabbing her.

Eventually, the much larger and stronger men quickly pinned her down on the bed "Let me go you freaks!" She yelled out while trying to wiggle her way out of their grasp "Just let me go!" were some of the pleas Sarah yelled out while one of the men grabbed her arms and kept them pinned down above her head "You won't be asking questions or seeing the light of day for quite some time" he stated while moving the white cloth towards her mouth. Sarah kept turning her head left and right while yelling "No!" to avoid the cloth from touching her mouth. He eventually managed to press the piece of cloth over her mouth while Sarah let out a loud grunt when it made contact. While the man pressed firmly on her mouth... "Mpph!...mmmph!...mmpph!" were the muffled cries Sarah made while the man kept softly saying "Shhh..Shhhh..Shhh". She was losing the battle with the chloroformed cloth agaisnt her mouth and Sarah's body would slowly stop flailing around and went limp, her head fell to one side, her mouth left partially open and her eyes slowly rolled shut, signifying she had passed out.

When Sarah woke up, what situation would she find herself in?
1.title: Where to Begin?

choices: Sarah responded softly and said "It was me"
The unknown girl chimed in that it was the "new girl"
A loud commotion of voices (Male prisoners coming back from lunch)
Follow a different girl in this situation
11.content:
Sarah eventually regained consciousness and found herself stuck in a prison cell. "How do I get out of here?" She stated while slowly standing up from being on the cold, hard cement floor. She said it loud enough for the individual in the next cell over to reply
"There is no way out and even if you tried, you won't get past the guards". "Who are you?" Sarah asked. "I am just another prisoner like yourself" she replied back. "Prisoner of what?" she exclaimed. "Well, that is a tough question, but all I will say is just obey and listen to your cell mate or you will be in for a rough night" the unknown girl responded back.

"Huh?" Sarah confused of what she just heard was still trying to regain all of her senses, she held her head like she had a migraine "Just save your energy" the unknown girl blurted out to her. "Why would i need to do that?" Sarah asked while trying to locate the voice. She knew it was a girl's voice coming from the cell to her right, but the wall blocked her vision.

The unknown girl in the cell left out a soft chuckle and said "You will see soon enough, they are about to come back from lunch and pick the next victim(s). "I need to get out of here! Help!! Somebody help me!!" Sarah yelled out while shaking the metal bars to try and get out of her cell, which echoed throughout the halls of the prison. "Shh! Be quiet! You don't want the guards to come punish you!" The unknown girl snapped back at her.

"Who said that?!?" A loud voice from down the hall asked. The sounds of fast footsteps came towards Sarah's cell, she backed up to not bring attention to herself. "I asked a question, who was that?!?!?" The guard asked while walking back and forth looking into each cell. "You better come forward or I will punish this entire section!" The guard stated.

What happens next?

Details about the Prison:

1. Girls are forcefully put in prison cells with convicts. The idea is that if the inmates get to tickle torture some girls, the chance of an escape, prison riots or attack on the guards is non existent.
2. The male prisoners get to choose what cell they go in each afternoon (create your own prisoner)
3. Avoid "Solitary Confinement" which is a room where the Warden, guards or other males will punish them with various forms of tickle torture.
4. The Warden is a very cunning and charismatic man that enjoys what he does a little too much, but dont ever get on his bad side.
5. There are very slim opportunities to escape, they will have to make the most of these chances, but if she fails, she will be in for a world of torture.
6. The guards like to break the rules and enjoy their own fun with the girl prisoners.
7. Add anything of your choosing that can include more details or new ideas to the situation.
11.title: Prison of Punishment

111.content:
*Ding dong* the doorbell rang several times before the man stood up. He was upset and frustrated he could not finish what he was doing to Sarah and let go of her feet forcefully and got up to answer the door. "I'm coming, I'm coming" he exclaimed while opening the door and immediately greeted two of his pals, Harry (a large and muscular man) and Ron (a lanky man).

"No way!!!" Exclaimed Ron while rubbing his hands together. "Look at what we have here!" Harry stated while pointing to Sarah on the couch."I can't believe my two eyes, how did you do it Frank?" Harry asked while walking closer to the couch. "Carl and I worked our magic like we always do" he replied back.

Harry decided to sit down on the couch and adjusted Sarah so that she was lying across his body with her butt in his lap and her upper body to the left side of the couch; while her legs were on the right. "I want in!" Ron yelled out while rushing to sit down to the left of Harry. He lifted Sarah's head and shoulders off of the couch so he could make room to sit down and gently place her upperbody back into his lap when he got comfortable.

Frank was the last one to come back and sit down on the couch and he was happy to be left with Sarah's feet in his lap. She was now struggling and lying across all 3 men ready to pounce on her extremely ticklish body. "There is only one thing left to do, what is your login information to your stream my dear?" Frank asked the writhing teen.

While Frank started to talk....

He was currently massaging both feet of hers. Harry had his large hands stroking her soft and smooth legs from her knees to the upper part of her thighs. This caressing of her body caused Sarah to have goosebumps all up and down her legs. Ron slowly pealed the tape off of her mouth. "Go to hell!" Sarah exclaimed.

There wasn't anything the ticklish teen could do, her arms were still tied together behind her back that were now pinned between her body and theirs, while her legs remained tied together. All she could try was to squirm and attempt to avoid the men from creepily groping her, but it was not working, especially when Ron rolled up her top over her head and out of the way to expose her grey cotton bralette and entire upper body.

"All we want is to have a stream with your fans, you dont want to disappoint them do you?" Frank stated growing angry that Sarah will not give them her login info. "Do your worst, you perverts" Sarah said with a snarl on her face.

"So you have chosen the hard way? Who wants do to the honors and kick this off?" Frank asked.
111.title: The doorbell rang

1111.content:
"Don't mind if I do!" Ron exclaimed without hesitation, diving his fingers onto Sarah's exposed belly "Hahahaha!!!" she exploded with laughter. His fingers were spider tickling her upperbody, from her ribcage on down to her belly button. As fast as his hands were going, she could not control the squirms of her body or the squeals coming from her mouth. Her whole body seemed to be lifted off of the couch while trying to twist and turn from being tickled so much. Harry and Frank did the best they could trying to keep her body from falling off of the couch. "Sorry I just couldn't help myself" Ron said while continuing running his fingers up and down her sensitive upper body.

"Hahahehehaha!!" Sarah exclaimed while the tickling continued. Ron started to explore other ticklish parts of her upper body by squeezing onto the sides of her stomach. This made Sarah's hip involuntarily thrust up in reaction every time Ron squeezed. He did not let up on the tickling one bit, she was an athletic girl and had endurance, but being tickled for more than a couple minutes really started to take an effect. She was heaving very heavily, each inhale and exhale coming from her body was shallow and fast, trying to catch her breath before each round of tickling Ron would commence on her upper body.

"My turn!" _______ exclaimed while taking over the tickling duties.
1111.title: Ron (tickle her upperbody)

choices: Refused to give up her information
Gave into Frank's demands and told him the information
11111.content:
Harry jumped in and started to slowly drag his hands from the inside of Sarah's knees all the way up her thighs. She giggled and squirmed as the gentle stroke of his fingers tickled her legs. While his fingers made their way up her legs, he stopped just below where her shorts ended and squeezed each thigh with one hand. "Hahahehehaha!" Sarah bursted out shrieks of laughter.

The harder he squeezed her soft and athletic thighs, the louder Sarah laughed. The tickling was so immense that her screams emitted no noise, but only gasps of air in between the laughing. Every involuntary squirm of her body, happened in a way he has not seen before and paired with her infectious screams of laughter, kept Harry motivated to continue the torture. "Looks like I found the spot!" Harry exclaimed while he kept squeezing her ticklish thighs over and over again. "Hahahehehaha stop!! hahaha!" Sarah tried to yell out before erupting in more laughter.

Sarah's face started to turn beet red due to the lack of oxygen and by the time Harry finally stopped tickling Sarah's thighs, she was getting less reactive to each finger and squeeze from Harry's tickling. Her body was glistening with a layer of sweat that was visible to all three men. Her chest was breathing up and down extremely fast and her heart beat was racing like she just ran five miles. The tickling that Ron and Harry just did, surprisingly did not make her pass out, but her endurance must be at an all time low.

Sarah, while catching her breath was asked by Frank "I doubt you want more tickling do you?" Sarah was tired and barely had enough energy to shake her head no several times. "So what is your login information? Frank replied.

Sarah....
11111.title: Harry (tickler her thighs)

choices: The men continue the tickle torture
111111.content:
How....about.....a....compromise?" Sarah asked softly while still catching her breath in between words. "Ha! Why would I do that? The best part is how ticklish you are". exclaimed Frank whil he went after her feet. Sarah tried to pull her legs away, but he grabbed them with a tough grip and placed them back into his lap.

Frank began to drag his fingers along her left sole. She tried biting her lips to not let her laugh out loud but she was so ticklish on her feet. He looked up and smiled as Sarah had her eyes shut and lips closed trying to fight against the sensations. He continued to stroke up and down her left sole leaving no ounce of skin untouched before moving closer to her curled toes. "Hahahaha!" giggled Sarah as she felt his nails along the sole of her left foot.

Frank chuckled at the sight before tickling her right foot. Harry and Ron watched in admiration as he continued to work his magic. Sarah soon felt Frank's fingers sneak between the toes on her right foot causing her to laugh some more "Hahahahaha!". Sarah tried to evade his fingers by wiggling and curling her feet, which only enticed Frank more as he enjoyed playing with them.

"I absolutely love these pretty toes of yours. So small. So cute. So TICKLISH!" Frank exclaimed as he continued to tickle her feet...

There was no end in sight for Sarah, the men were going to keep up the tickling until she gave in, but she was a resilient girl and had to figure out a way to stop this onslaught of tickle torture, but how? With no time to react or think, Sarah was stuck in a predicament.

What happens next?
111111.title: Asked for a compromise

12.content:
Sarah woke up feeling very groggy, it took her awhile to realize what exactly was going on, her head started to nod awake and her eyes fluttered and opened up. She tried to move but soon noticed she was pinned down in an X position on a cold table, she was getting goosebumps just lying there. Her arms and legs were firmly strapped down, leaving no wiggle room to break free.

Mppph!" Sarah tried to talk but was muffled from the tape covered over her mouth. She looked side to side and saw other girls scattered and tied on tables just like hers. She tilted her head forward and saw a group of men gathered waiting for what seemed to be an announcement.

"Everyone, please pick your lab partner" a man's voice stated. The group of high school to older adult aged men scattered across the room sitting down on stools that were placed around each table. The seats filled up quick around Sarah, she looked left, right and there had to be a half dozen, maybe even 8 men around her table.

Sarah's breathing was getting heavier, signaling how nervous and frightened she was in her current situation. She couldn't protest or yell for help, only muffled cries could be heard. She tested the straps again and her writhing didn't help, she was stuck and helpless.

Who appears to be the teacher started talking, Sarah's eyes widened when he said.."Ok class, our first lesson of the day is.....".

Details about the School:

1. The male "students" will take classes and learn different types of tickle torture. The girls are used for the students of any age to get hands on practice while the lessons are taking place.
2. There are several classes throughout the day, that even include gym class, which involves tickle wrestling and other forms of physical work that involve tickle torture. The classes can be of any choosing (create your own class).
3. Sarah currently is part of the "beginner's tickle torture 101".
4. Any form of discipline or punishment is done by the "Principal". He was a bigtime pervert and enjoys dealing out the punishment himself. A large and imposing man that scares everyone.
5. Sarah is tied up or bound for most of the day and will have to be opportunistic if she gets a chance to escape.
6. Add anything of your choosing that can include more details or new ideas to the situation.

13.content:
Sarah woke up dazed and confused in what appears to be a closet, but it was completely empty. Her eyes were adjusting to the bright light coming from the ceiling while she regained alertness. "Hello? Where am I?" Were some of the questions Sarah yelled out. After several minutes of yelling, a robotic voice started talking from a speaker system in the ceiling....

"Hello there Athletic Zelda Girl, glad you can join us for the fun we are about to have, we are a big fan of yours" the voice stated. "Who are you? What do you want from me?!?" Sarah cried out. "When the door opens, you will find yourself in a room where you must solve a series of puzzles to unlock the next room and so on until you complete the "Mansion of Mystery".

"What if I don't want to play your sadistic game and refuse?" Sarah stated while folding her arms in a sort of protest. "Each room has a time limit, you fail the room, you will receive the punishment that comes with it" the voice responded back.

"This isn't fair! Let me out!" Sarah cried. "Complete all the rooms miss and you will be set free, your time starts now" the voice ended its speech. The door opened and Sarah reluctantly walked into a room that took the appearance of a.....

Details about the Mansion:

1. Each room has a series of clues and puzzles that must be completed for the next room to open.
2. There are a series of traps, obstacles or human beings that will impede the progress.
Example A: Someone hiding in a closet, under the bed, etc that will jump out and tickle the girl.
Example B: There can also be a supernatural or similar obstacle or trap like tentacles or other creatures sent out to tickle.
3. There is a live audience watching through a camera system in each room. The audience places bets and can buy the traps, obstacles or etc to be placed in a room to add excitement and hurt the chances of the girl succeeding.
4. Each room make up is Author's Choice, come up with any style, theme or design of your choosing.
5. Each punishment is also Author's Choice.
6. Add anything of your choosing that can include more details or new ideas to the situation.
13.title: Mansion of Mystery

135.content:

1. Emma's parents were not very good examples and her step dad was the lowest of scum, he ended up giving her to the men that run this sadistic mansion in exchange for illegal items.

2. Natalie's innocent nature got her to offer rides to these two men that needed a ride and in turn they led her to this mansion instead.

14.content:
Sarah woke up in a room she has never seen before, along with several dozen other girls. In front of them was a man with four large security officers.

Sarah and the other girls were directed to sit down on a set of bleachers. All of the girls were just as nervous and confused as she was. Once all of them settled down for this unexpected gathering, the man went straight to the point, introducing them to the "game". Immediately, the girls began chattering with one another only to be quieted down by the speaker.

Rules to a game?

Sarah quickly pondered why it was only girls who were invited and then the man turned on the TV screen to show another room full of school to adult aged males. The room full of males had one goal, to capture all of the girls and torture them until they yell out ‘I surrender’ if they submit to them. Among those who last the next twenty-four hours without being caught would be given free college tuition. Any doors leading to the outside are already locked, but anywhere within the building was allowed.

Widening her eyes when the word ‘torture’ brought her concern. Would they actually try to harm them? The fact that only girls were brought here only implied lewd intentions from the men. She wasn’t too sure how to feel about this situation and wanted to see what the other students would do before making her own decision.

One of the other girls stood up and complained about the entire setup. In response to her outrage, several of the security officers grabbed and carried her off. As if to set an example, they strapped her down to a table, completely overpowering her in terms of physical strength. The girl continued to yell in rage until the men suddenly tickled her without mercy, leading to an abrupt squeals of laughter.

Sarah and the rest of the girls watched fearfully at how effortlessly the girl was handled. This wasn't a game where she would be pit against the other girls directly. It was the men in the other classroom who were the threats. If torture involved tickling, then she was already at a huge disadvantage if captured. Out of everyone in the room, she very well might possess the most sensitive body. However, if she was to be restrained and tormented like the girl is right now, then it would only be a matter of time before she goes insane. But, if that does happen, she could always surrender. However, that free college tuition was also quite enticing. Her family would be thrilled, and she would only need to suffer for twenty-four hours. One day’s worth of time for four years’ worth of benefit.

The door to the room opened and the game had begun. The dozens of girls dashed towards the door. Sarah quickly stood up, staring at the girls dispersing out. Several shoulders bumped and rammed into hers, causing her to stagger. Following others’ example, she ran off the best as she could, but the crowd of girls caused her to be slower at running.

Hurrying down the hallway, she was running around aimlessly, unsure what to do or where to go.

Where does she go next?

Details about the game:

1. There are many traps set up in the rooms, hallways etc, along with places to hide. Each room can have machines or other items used for torture.
2. Each room has a different theme (Author's choice).
3. There are several different stories to the building, almost causing it to be a maze and very tough to navigate.
4. What Sarah and the rest of the girls weren't told about the game: if they surrendered, they were given to that male(s) as a tickle slave, so competition between the men will get fierce to get Sarah to surrender.
5. If Sarah or others last the 24 hours, they will have to endure the worst round of tickle torture in the "Winner's Circle". There is no free tuition, eventually all girls will surrender.
6. Add anything of your choosing that can include more details or new ideas to the situation.

15.content:
Sarah was slow to wake up, it took a moment and several nods of her head for her to fully awake and find out what sort of predicament she was in. She wiggled her body while trying to stand up but was unable to move, her arms seemed to be tied together behind her back at the wrists and her legs tied together just above her knees and at her ankles. The worst part is that Sarah was sitting in some strangers lap!

"Mpph!" Sarah tried to speak but only a muffled voice was heard by the man. "Looks like you are awake! Perfect!" He stated while grabbing Sarah around the waist and pulled her closer into his body so they were touching. Her tied up arms were pinned against his stomach and her back. "Of course, you know what happens next," the man taunted, moving a hand over her tight stomach, while his other hand reached up and stroked her hair. He exhaled excitedly through his teeth, while continuing running his fingers across her belly and moving both hands underneath her top.

She froze up as she felt his callused fingers slide briefly up towards her heaving chest and then he stopped and said. "You know, when I was a boy your age, no girls went near me," he confessed while he continued sliding his hands up her shirt. "Same was true of most of my friends. And now we're all sad old men who never knew the feeling of a tender teen like yourself." he stated while he caressed her upper body.

"It's unfair, really. Unjust. I mean, you see yourself, right? No man is pure enough not to want you on sight, from your preacher to your teacher" he stated while continuing to grope her "This is for all the men who don't have this chance," Sarah was desperate--whimpering and whining into the tape over her mouth while he was speaking and groping her.

"This is how tonight is going to go, if you decide to misbehave, we will have no choice but to punish you. We are waiting for the rest of the party to arrive. You cause any funny business and I will make sure we have some fun and expose Athletic Zelda Girl to the dark web" He told Sarah sternly. She shook her head yes hesitantly while tears ran across her face. "Good girl" the man responded back while removing his hands from underneath her top.

"Now, stay here and don't move a muscle. I will be right back and start preparing for the festivities tonight" he stated while getting up and tossing her off of his lap and onto the couch.

What did Sarah attempt while being tied up?

Details about the house:

1. All of the men coming over are prime stalkers of Sarah and the other girls kidnapped because of their famous/online presence.
2. There are several other girls in different rooms of the house, where eventually Sarah will be placed in after her "initiation".
3. These men host a streaming service that have a variety of ways they interact and help decide what happens to the girl(s).
4. Sarah's and the other girl's best chance of escape is luring one of the men to take off the bondage and run away at the first opportunity.
5. One of the men is called "The Scientist", he likes to try his new tickle device inventions.
6. Add anything of your choosing that can include more details or new ideas to the situation.
15.title: House of Horrors

151.content:
Sarah writhed all that she could to try and break out of being tied up, unfortunately for her, zip ties were used to bind her wrists and rope for her legs that were almost impossible to break out of, especially since her hands were tied behind her back."Mpph!" Muffled grunts of effort came from Sarah while she continued her effort to break free for several minutes.

She was lying face up across the couch when the man came back into the living room. He sat down on the opposite side of the couch where her feet were placed. He grabbed her feet with a painful grip and yanked then towards his face, causing her whole body to creep forward. "Most guys would be lucky just to be in the same room with you, but here I am getting to break you in" he stated while methodically taking off her shoes and socks on both feet and tossing them onto the ground.

He dragged her struggling feet towards his face, studying them. They were tiny and perfect. Smooth and creamy arches, soft pink and white soles, with adorable toes and glossy nails. He raised his spare hand over one helpless squirming sole. Sarah was trying to squirm away from him, but his grip around her thin ankles was too strong. He was inches from her helpless, captive soles. He traced a single finger down one toe, across her sole.

He started slow, he dragged all five nails down, starting at her toes and down her heel. Her feet felt like heaven in his hand, and he felt momentarily high from the feeling of power and control. Sarah was totally his, and a single finger on her sole showed it. He used five. The teenager jerked and yelped and whimpered; fighting with strength she didn't even know she had. He had to steady himself and readjust his grip at her rebellion, but with pleasure in the act. "That was a single rake of my nails," he said, finally pulling the slow drag past her heel. "You know how much more of that I'm going to do, you have alot of energy" he replied.

Next, he dragged a single nail over her toes, from the big to the small. He was delighted as she jerked and yelped with each new contact, curling and flexing her feet in a desperate, doomed effort to protect her toes. "I had no idea feet could be so soft," he said. She tried to beg, but nothing made it through the tape but soft whimpering. He smiled at the sound.

He began to spider his fingers across Sarah's teenage soles, meanwhile, she was shocked at the overpowering ticklish sensation racing up across her body. She was ticklish, but the feelings were so powerful that anything over a few seconds became a literal torture for her. She began to whimper between her muffled giggles of laughter.

"No!" she attempted to cry, but through the gag only a muted "Mphh!" emerged. The man grinned, and again released a wave of torture on her feet. The teen bucked and whined, and he loved having such power over someone so young and so beautiful. She was wholly and completely his, to feed his darkest and wildest dreams. As he thought, he ran his long nails over her perfect little soles; he could tell she was having trouble even breathing now. He poked her soft toes; they were round and bubbly and perfect. And, judging from her squirming, sensitive as well. A dark vision of those cute little toes, locked in a vice while the girl begs for mercy.

He pulled Sarah's feet closer and opened his mouth. Time to see what teen feet tasted like and how much tickling his tongue could do. Sarah, went wild anew with protest. This man was so ugly, the thought of her foot being in his disgusting mouth was repulsive. Sarah was full of hatred, but it looked like there was nothing she could do to stop him from enjoying her. Before he could suck on her toes...
151.title: Attempt to break free

1511.content:
*Ding dong* the doorbell rang several times before the man stood up. He was upset and frustrated he could not finish what he was doing to Sarah and let go of her feet forcefully and got up to answer the door. "I'm coming, I'm coming" he exclaimed while opening the door and immediately greeted two of his pals, Harry (a large and muscular man) and Ron (a lanky man).

"No way!!!" Exclaimed Ron while rubbing his hands together. "Look at what we have here!" Harry stated while pointing to Sarah on the couch."I can't believe my two eyes, how did you do it Frank?" Harry asked while walking closer to the couch. "Carl and I worked our magic like we always do" he replied back.

Harry decided to sit down on the couch and adjusted Sarah so that she was lying across his body with her butt in his lap and her upper body to the left side of the couch; while her legs were on the right. "So you have chosen the hard way? Who wants do to the honors and kick this off?" Frank asked.
1511.title: The doorbell rang

15111.content:

His fingers were spider tickling her upperbody, from her ribcage on down to her belly button. "Hahahehehaha!!" Sarah exclaimed while the tickling continued. Ron started to explore other ticklish parts of her upper body by squeezing onto the sides of her stomach. This made Sarah's hip involuntarily thrust up in reaction every time Ron squeezed. He did not let up on the tickling one bit, she was an athletic girl and had endurance, but being tickled for more than a couple minutes really started to take an effect. She was heaving very heavily, each inhale and exhale coming from her body was shallow and fast, trying to catch her breath before each round of tickling Ron would commence on her upper body.

"My turn!" _______ exclaimed while taking over the tickling duties.

choices: Refused to give up her information
Gave into Frank's demands and told him the information
151111.content:
Harry jumped in and started to slowly drag his hands from the inside of Sarah's knees all the way up her thighs. She giggled and squirmed as the gentle stroke of his fingers tickled her legs. While his fingers made their way up her legs, he stopped just below where her shorts ended and squeezed each thigh with one hand. "Hahahehehaha!" Sarah bursted out shrieks of laughter.

The harder he squeezed her soft and athletic thighs, the louder Sarah laughed. The tickling was so immense that her screams emitted no noise, but only gasps of air in between the laughing. Every involuntary squirm of her body, happened in a way he has not seen before and paired with her infectious screams of laughter, kept Harry motivated to continue the torture. "Looks like I found the spot!" Harry exclaimed while he kept squeezing her ticklish thighs over and over again. "Hahahehehaha stop!! hahaha!" Sarah tried to yell out before erupting in more laughter.

Sarah's face started to turn beet red due to the lack of oxygen and by the time Harry finally stopped tickling Sarah's thighs, she was getting less reactive to each finger and squeeze from Harry's tickling. Her body was glistening with a layer of sweat that was visible to all three men. Her chest was breathing up and down extremely fast and her heart beat was racing like she just ran five miles. The tickling that Ron and Harry just did, surprisingly did not make her pass out, but her endurance must be at an all time low.

Sarah, while catching her breath was asked by Frank "I doubt you want more tickling do you?" Sarah was tired and barely had enough energy to shake her head no several times. "So what is your login information? Frank replied.

Sarah....
151111.title: Harry (tickler her thighs)

choices: Sarah comes up with a plan
The men continue the tickle torture
1511111.content:
"How....about.....a....compromise?" Sarah asked softly while still catching her breath in between words. "Ha! Why would I do that? The best part is how ticklish you are". exclaimed Frank whil he went after her feet. Sarah tried to pull her legs away, but he grabbed them with a tough grip and placed them back into his lap.

Frank began to drag his fingers along her left sole. She tried biting her lips to not let her laugh out loud but she was so ticklish on her feet. He looked up and smiled as Sarah had her eyes shut and lips closed trying to fight against the sensations. He continued to stroke up and down her left sole leaving no ounce of skin untouched before moving closer to her curled toes. "Hahahaha!" giggled Sarah as she felt his nails along the sole of her left foot.

Frank chuckled at the sight before tickling her right foot. Harry and Ron watched in admiration as he continued to work his magic. Sarah soon felt Frank's fingers sneak between the toes on her right foot causing her to laugh some more "Hahahahaha!". Sarah tried to evade his fingers by wiggling and curling her feet, which only enticed Frank more as he enjoyed playing with them.

"I absolutely love these pretty toes of yours. So small. So cute. So TICKLISH!" Frank exclaimed as he continued to tickle her feet...

There was no end in sight for Sarah, the men were going to keep up the tickling until she gave in, but she was a resilient girl and had to figure out a way to stop this onslaught of tickle torture, but how? With no time to react or think, Sarah was stuck in a predicament.

What happens next?
1511111.title: Asked for a compromise

155.content:
What other girl instead of Sarah got forced into the House of Horrors?

1. Emma liked to talk to males several years older than her through social media and when she decided to meet one of her "friends" in person, they turned out to be much older than they led on. Before she could make a run for it, she was kidnapped and brought to their home.

2. Natalie had a big following on social media because of her beauty/modeling and would be kidnapped similar to Sarah, by creepy stalkers.
155.title: Follow a different girl in this situation

info.brief_description: Sarah will be kidnapped by stalkers and put into situations involving tickle torture
info.description:
Sarah: A super friendly and athletic 18 year old teenaged beauty. She had strawberry blonde hair that went just past her shoulders, deep blue eyes and an athletic body. Her infectious smile and bubbly laugh created a lust in every man's mind.
Strengths & Abilities: Athleticism (she had alot of endurance to take a generous amount of tickle torture and speed/agility to run away and evade bad guys). Clever/Crafty (can think on her feet and get out of tough situations).
Weakness: Extremely Ticklish and Strength (cannot fight back well, or get out of being tied up or out from one's grasp).

Rules:
1. No one sentence chapters, try for 1000 characters and a developed story using proper grammar.
2. Feel free to add any additional characters, plot points and backstory to any situation.
3. GP will be awarded for chapters added to the story.
info.pretty_title: The No Good, Very Bad, Ticklish Day
